subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer faltered in his tuneup for the French Open, losing to the defending champion Albert Montanes, 6-2, 7-6 (5), Saturday in the Estoril Open semifinals in Oeiras, Portugal.
snippet: Roger Federer faltered in his tuneup for the French Open, losing to the defending champion Albert Montanes, 6-2, 7-6 (5), Saturday in the Estoril Open semifinals in Oeiras, Portugal.
